title: Paper Planes
excerpt: Folded dreams launched from a high window, catching the updraft of hope...
body:
Folded dreams launched from a high window,
Catching the updraft of hope.
Fragile wings of ruled notebook paper,
Carrying secrets written in invisible ink.

They spiral down,
Crashing into the concrete reality,
Or perhaps,
Just once,
One catches the wind
And sails across the ocean.
